author: Marchiner
content:
Pdp and Adrian,

Congratulations again, and thanks to share the slides to people that live so far away...

author: carstein
content: It was great fun meeting you guys - I've enjoyed your presentation very much. Friday party was even better :)

author: Gynvael Coldwind
content: Great that U could come, both the presentations were great! ;>

author: Adrian 'pagvac' Pastor
content:
Thanks for the feedback Marchiner!

@Carstein: parties are always the best part of hacker cons IMO :)

author: carstein
content:
Those movie clips are awesome. Who is so talented? ;) Mind if I embed it on my site?

author: pdp
content: I am glad that you like them.

author: Adrian 'pagvac' Pastor
content:
@carstein: I really hope we can go back next year cuz it was really fun and loved Krakow (especially the food!).

@pdp: one word: AWESOME!

author: ducer
content: Adrian, tell me why........ I've got a lot of stuff to do :( Btw, I hope that you enjoy Cracow's convention. See ya soon in London, bros!

author: Adrian 'pagvac' Pastor
content: Let me know when you come over to London ducer, and hope to see you next time I go to Krakow!

author: Adrian 'pagvac' Pastor
content:
@Gynvael: thank you very much for the kind comments. Although I met some of your colleagues from Hispasec (Emiliano y Julio), I don't think I had a chance to meet you :( . 

btw, congrats on winning CTF!
